description: " The app for the fans, by the fans, of the fans who love Idol –Fandom! Haven’t you heard?! Ten million people are already using this app- Fandom! You can find out about Idol through Fandom, talk with fans from all over the world and also feel like Idol is greeting you personally through your lock screen! Cheer Them On You can share pictures with other fans, send messages of encouragement to the star, talk with him or her and also see all of the star’s social networking accounts such as Twitter, Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram- without logging in! View Pictures There are many unique features such as stars’ photos and albums, which you can share with your friends or your special someone. The daily pictures are diverse and varied, and you can also save directly and share these pictures with your friends! View Schedule Don’t miss a minute of your favorite star’s schedule. Fans can edits stars’ schedules and create their own! You’ve never experienced anything like this before! Fans can directly upload information such as reruns, broadcasts, signing events and so on. So you’ll know virtually everything about your idol’s schedule! View Video Of course, you can watch your star’s music video, in addition to many variety and television shows! Album list You can listen to all of your favorite star’s music and albums! Interactive Lock Screen Complete the app with your name and picture! Every morning the app will call your name and ask you, “Did you sleep well?” In the evening, it says “I miss you” . With Fandom, you’ll have something to look forward to at any time of day. Alternate Lock Screen Instead of your favorite star’s photo, you can also insert photos or your boyfriend or girlfriend, pets or friends and use the lock screen So, how about starting Fandom today? ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Question and Feedback E-mail : help@bluemoon.io Tweeter : https://twitter.com/star_fandom Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/io.bluemoon.fandom Kakao Story Channel : https://story.kakao.com/ch/idolfandom Naver blog : http://blog.naver.com/idolfandom

description: The satellite list is in the app menu. For people who are giving me one star "because this app use camera permission". This app need this permission, to work ARView. It is not taking any photos - only use camera preview to show you where the satellite is on the sky... SatFinder (Satellite Finder) is a tool which will help you to set up satellite dish. It will give you azimuth, elevation and LNB tilt for your location (based on GPS) and chosen satellite from list. The result is shown both as numeric data and graphical on google maps. It has also built in compass which will help you to find proper satellite azimuth. It also can use augmented reality to show where is satellite on camera view. The satellite list is complete and includes all televison satellites, so the app should work worldwide. If you found some errors please send me e-mail. It will help me make this app better ;) Since version 1.07 there is whole world FTA and encrypted channels database. It take a few seconds to show whole list so be patient. It use internet connection. Top 10 countries got fixed language on nice list. The list will be updated. The users from another countries can type language manual. But the list uses language shortcuts, for example - English = eng, German = ger, etc... The channel list is still incomplete - I'm working on it. If you find error on list please send me e-mail...
release_text: small bug fix If there are any problems please send me e-mail. I do not have access to all type of the smartphones and tablets...

description: Explore like never before. MyTopo Maps is a mapping and trip planning app to organize all your outdoor and backroad adventures. View more than 68,000 topo maps in US and Canada. Also, check out aerial, terrain, street and hybrid maps. Mark points, find places and store all your trip info on the Trip Cloud, a wireless service that allows you to access your trips on any device. *** Note: This app is designed for the Android tablets. Got an Android phone? Try Trimble Outdoors Navigator, our in-the-field navigation app. *** This app is BEST FOR: Scouting trails, exploring parks, planning outdoor vacations, viewing backcountry areas on topo maps and aerial photos, finding forest roads and campsites, preplanning hiking trails, snowshoeing routes, backcountry skiing sessions, camping and ATV offroad trips ------ ** START WITH A GREAT MAP ** • View five different map types: streets, hybrid, aerial, topo and terrain. • MyTopo Maps provides the most up-to-date topos maps available in the United States. We have enhanced more than 14,000 USGS quads with digital updates from the U.S. Forest Service and other map providers. • Access more than 68,000 topo maps in US and Canada that are seamlessly stitched together for fast and easy viewing. Topos scales are 1:24K in the Lower 48, 1:63K in Alaska and 1:50K in Canada. • See two maps at once. No single map type has all the essential details to plan a trip. So turn on Dual Map View and fade between two different map types. • View aerial imagery from Bing maps. • Upgrade to Pro to create map packs to store maps on your phone. This app allows you to save topos (MyTopo), aerials (Bing), streets (OSM), and terrain (OCM) map types on your phone. ** POWERFUL TRIP PLANNING TOOLS ** Place Search: Use our search to find more than 10 million places. Trails, peaks, lakes, rivers, ghost towns and more. Ruler: Measure the distance between two points. Smart Paste: Copy GPS coordinates from websites and instantly map their locations into MyTopo Maps. Waypoints: Drag waypoints on to the map. Name them and add descriptions. Coordinates: Match your latitude/longitude or UTM coordinates to your paper map or GPS device. Supported map datum: WGS84 and NAD27. Digital Compass: Press the mini-compass to overlay a large digital compass on the map. Custom Paper Map: Order a waterproof custom printed topo map or aerial image directly through our app with just a few taps of a button. Printed and shipped by MyTopo.com within 24 hours.   ** SAVE TO THE TRIP CLOUD ** Register a free account to save your outdoor trips to our Trip Cloud. Benefits include: • Store and backup unlimited trips. Never lose files again. • Auto-sync trips between your computer, mobile phone and your Android tablet. • Enhance trips planned in MyTopo Maps with more map tools at TrimbleOutdoors.com, including .gpx import, geotagged photos and videos, turn-by-turn routes and more. (requires membership) • Open trips in our mobile navigation app, Trimble Outdoors Navigator. Learn more: http://get.it/trimbleoutdoors/8oUv • Share trips with the Trimble Outdoors community or privately between outdoor friends. ** LEARN MORE ** Visit our website and check out thousands of trips submitted by the Trimble Outdoors community. Click over to: trimbleoutdoors.com. ----- Note: This version of MyTopo Maps is designed and optimized for Android tablets. Please note your device must have a GPS chip to show your exact location on a map. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

description: The Game 2048 is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! This is 2in1 version ! You installing the game on your mobile phone and get two identical working games: one on your mobile phone and one on your Android Wear smartwatch. It's smallest 2048 app (only 175k) ! It working on all devices with all screen resolution, including Android Wear smartwatches (round and square) ! How to play: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Every turn, a new tile will randomly appear in an empty spot on the outer frame of the board with a value of either 2 (90%) or 4 (10%). When 2048 tile is created, the player wins!
release_text: added Android Wear smartwatches support fixed save and restore state added new and undo buttons

description: Your new favorite Monkey has learned how to drive and race Go Karts, ATVs, and cars! Your new pal Monkey is racing cars across the desert, jungle, and mountains in search of stars. You start the game with a basic stunt go Kart and will being racing through the desert. There are three hidden stars on each level. Find and collect them all to get a perfect score and to beat the game. Complete levels to unlock all 6 stunt cars, ATVs, and karts for more fun and faster racing! Each new kart or ATV is faster and more fun than for racing and doing stunts than the one before. Each level is designed to be a challenge. There are sabotages, obstacles, huge jumps and puzzles you will have to figure out in order to beat the game. These level are harsh. They are designed to destroy you. Be careful! Game Features: * 3 fun worlds * 30 tracks - Each track was hand designed like fun obstacle puzzle course. * 6 fast and fun cars * Huge jumps * Water hazards * Bubble bouncers * Massive Gaps * Sabotage Spikes

description: _▒°C▒_ Thermometer _▒°F▒_ ▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔ Classic Celsius / Fahrenheit thermometer in your hand Features: ─────── ■ Celsius & Fahrenheit scale ■ indoor & outdoor option* ■ classic thermometer look ■ digital and analog type ■ out weather background ■ animated liquid ■ 16 backgrounds ■ 4 liquid types ■ tablet support ■ free NOTE: This app can measure the ambient temperature in which your device is, however very few devices have dedicated ambient temperature sensor so on most devices the displayed temperature is the temperature of the device's internal electronics or battery and this is similar to the ambient temperature only if the device was long time on stand-by. So, the only correct way to know the actual ambient temperature is to start this app right after you wake your device that has been sitting on stand-by for at least an hour. This limitation is not app's fault but by using this method you can measure the actual ambient temperature to an accuracy of a degree. *Outdoor temperature and weather information is provided by the YR.NO weather web service.

description: Französisch-Deutsch Wörterbuch offline Dictionnaire Français-Allemand hors-ligne * More than 70.000 words! * Bookmark your favorite translations for fast reference * Works offline! No Internet connection needed, no extra files to download! The best translator for your trips, your studies, or when no data connection is available. * Listen to the correct pronunciation in French and German using Android's built-in Text-to-speech synthesizer. * Share translations by SMS, email, etc. This version is supported by ads. If you like the application, please consider upgrading to the ad-free version to support the development. Thanks :) FAQ: Q: How can I share a translation? A: Just press 2-3 seconds over the translation and you will be presented with a menu with all available sharing options based on the apps installed in your device (Email, SMS, etc) Q: How can I change the speed of the voice? A: The speed of the speech is controlled by the TTS engine installed with Android. It can be set up by going to: Settings --> Voice input & output settings --> Text to speech settings --> speech rate Q: How can I change the speech language? A: Just go to Menu --> Settings and select the language. 2 languages are available: * French * German DISCLAIMER: The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings. If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required. We recommend installing it before traveling as roaming data tariffs may be very expensive.

description: This is a Handy Torch through Home or Volume UP, it lets you turn ON the Flashlight by a Long Press on the Home or Volume UP button while Screen is OFF , and turn it OFF by a Volume Down or Home button Press or a Screen ON action (Power or Home button) Features: - Run Flashlight through the main flash LED - Blank screen Requires Xposed framework for Hardware buttons use . Xposed Features: - Customize Long press delay to run the Flashlight - Customize Flashlight timeout - Run the Flashlight even while Music is ON When the device enter into deep sleep mode, you can NOT wake it up with volume button, you need to wake up the device before trying to run the Torch through hardware buttons (This is an Android limitation) Required Permission: - Internet for Ads to support my work, you can remove them through the "Remove Ads" option - Camera and Wakelock to run the Torch (Flashlight) - Vibration
release_text: Fixed a regression on some Android 5.1- Roms On Android 6.0+ you can run the torch all the time even if in the deep sleep mode, but on android 5.1 and bellow, you need to press the volume button at least one time then hold down to run the torch if you want to wake up the device from deep sleep.

description: The Owl Pellet - Our first App in the Science Adventure Series! IMPORTANT NOTE: This App has only been tested on Google Nexus Devices. Go on an adventure to find your very own owl pellets to prepare, dissect, and reassemble. Make sure to keep an eye out for the other forest creatures you might encounter that are part of the owl’s habitat. The Froguts Owl Pellet adventure is both an educational and whimsical journey to discover what owl pellets are, where they come from, and how to dissect them. The primary learning objectives are to - Teach How: • habitats are comprised of many creatures. • owl pellet formation occurs within owls. • predators and prey interact with each other. • skeletons are made of many bones, and that they have similar names across animals. • skeletons are put together. • food webs move energy up to the predators. • herbivores, insectivores, carnivores, and omnivores feed. • owl pellets are handled, prepared, and dissected. - Includes Quiz NGSS Disciplinary Core Ideas addressed: LS2.A, LS2.B, LS4.C, LS4.A, LS4.C, LS4.D

description: Play the addictive new puzzle game from the makers of Candy Blast Mania, Jewel Mania and Bubble Mania! Take a bite into Fruit Splash Mania with its unique line-drawing puzzle gameplay! Match together festive Fruits that ripen into colossal combos! - PLAY through 120+ Levels of fruit-tastic fun as you match bushels of delicious lemons, berries, and watermelons! - MASTER five challenging gameplay modes, including High Score, Free The Fruit, and Fruit Drop! - BLAST your way past Vines, Stumps, and Doom Slime to free your Fruit friends! - BOOST your score with potent power-ups like the Bomb and the Cross Blaster. Earn three stars on every level! - CHALLENGE! Climb your way up the Leaderboards to be the best puzzle player! - EXPLORE juicy jungles, mouth-watering mountains, delectable deserts, and more! - EARN keys from completing challenges to win Gems, Boosts, and more! - STELLAR performance with top-notch graphics, amusing animations, captivating music and expertly crafted sound effects! - FREE levels, obstacles and game modes added regularly! No pause to the puzzles! - CUSTOMIZED for your Android phone or tablet! Please note that Fruit Splash Mania is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To disable this feature, go to the Google Play app on your device, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer for Android devices. Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy Note: READ_PHONE_STATE permission is used to help us remember your puzzle progress Follow Storm8 www.storm8.com facebook.com/storm8 twitter.com/storm8

description: 사이냅 뷰어 아래아한글 에디션 주요기능 - 지원 파일 형식 : 아래아한글 문서(97~2010)(*.hwp) - 문서 내용 보기 기능 제공 - 이메일/탐색기에서 문서 바로 보기 기능 제공 - 이메일 첨부파일 전송 기능 제공 - SD 카드내 아래아한글(hwp) 파일 목록 제공 유의사항 - 모바일 단말기에서 동작하는 프로그램으로 레이아웃이나 글꼴이 원본과 다를 수 있습니다. - 머리글, 바닥글, 페이지 구분 등이 원본과 다를 수 있습니다. - 그리기 개체 등 일부 개체의 모양은 원본과 다를 수 있습니다. - TIFF/WMF/EMF, 수식, 그리기 개체, OLE 개체, 글맵시, 차트는 현재 지원되지 않습니다. - 아래아한글 프로그램에서 "배포용 문서로 저장하기" 기능으로 저장된 HWP 문서는 지원되지 않습니다. - 사용자 암호가 지정된 문서는 지원하지 않습니다. 본 제품은 (주)한글과 컴퓨터의 아래아한글 문서 파일(.hwp) 공개 문서를 참고하여 개발되었습니다.
release_text: [v1.9] - 젤리빈 이상에서 문서 내 텍스트를 선택하여 전화거는 기능 오류 수정 - 젤리빈 이상에서 문서 내 링크 클릭 안되는 오류 수정 [v1.8] - Dropbox 연계 기능 추가 Dropbox 연계 기능 추가로 Dropbox에 있는 HWP 파일 미리보기가 가능합니다. - 갤럭시노트2, 갤럭시S3에서 멀티윈도우 지원 - 사이냅 파일 매니저 출시 안내 파일명 검색 뿐만 아니라, 아래아한글(HWP), MS-Office, TXT, MP3 파일 등의 "내용 검색"도 가능한 파일 관리 어플리케이션입니다. [v1.7.1] - 이메일 첨부 파일 열리지 않는 오류 수정 - ICS(4.0)에서 전화번호 선택 후 전화 걸기 기능 추가 * 진저브레드는 기존과 동일합니다. - ICS(4.0) 이상에서 화면을 두 번 터치하여 화면 폭에 맞추어 내용을 보는 기능 추가 * 문서가 클 경우 동작 속도가 느릴 수 있습니다. - 메뉴 UI를 ICS 스타일로 변경

description: Pinball Pro is #1 pinball game for your Android phone and features exact recreations of the all-time greatest pinball tables. This game sets a new standard for realistic ball physics and graphical detail in pinball video games. You will be stunned with the level of realism and cutting-edge visuals. How to Play: - Press and hold anywhere to launch a new ball - Touch right or left side to control flips Game Features: - 5 Innovative Table: Classic, Lucky Stones, Lucky Wheel, Carnival, Chrismas - Visually stunning graphics - Unique soundtrack with atmospheric music, sound effects - The most advanced ball physics
release_text: v2.0: Fixed some minor bugs in the last update. Thanks.

description: Fitness tracking made simple, and beautiful. Seamlessly integrated with Dropbox to backup and sync your workout sessions and programs to all your devices. Progression – helping you move forward in the gym, and in life. This is how it works • Pick one of the many built in programs to follow. • Build your own program from scratch. • Workout on the fly. Adding exercises as you go and feel. Track weights lifted throughout your workout sessions with your phone or watch. As soon as you’ve done an exercise once, it’s last used weights will be automatically inputted for you in future workouts. Tap complete workout when you’re done and voila, after leaving a comment you’re taken to the history view where you can find your newly finished workout and all earlier workouts you’ve accomplished. Head on over to the statistics page to view a throughout overview of your progress for each exercise, including graphs displaying your progress over time as well as specific details about your one rep max and other related stats. This is why it works What you achieved the last time you performed an exercise is always available during your workout – allowing you to fully focus on beating it, time after time. By always striving for progression in the gym, you will become a winner, not only in the gym – but also in life. • You’ll be able to tackle everyday problems with ease. • Your confidence will grow each time you break a plateu. • As you evolve, so does your body. Regardless of your fitness goals, improving yourself will improve your body for the better. Tips & Trix • Use the rest timer to ensure you don’t rest too long or too little between sets. • Calculate the number of each plate you’ll need for your upcoming set with the plate calculator. • Drag handles next to input fields allow you to drag the number up and down instead of typing. • Discover! There are over 300 built in exercises, a good chance for you to find new fun exercises to help you on your journey. • Review workouts on your tablet, start them on your phone, and track weights on your watch.
release_text: We’ve added support for cardio exercises! You’ll find over 20 of the most common ones built in, and you have the ability to create custom ones tailored specifically to your needs. Adding them to your workouts is just as simple as with any other exercise in the app. Exercises targeting forearms can now be found under their own category. Last but not least – we’ve taken the liberty to fix all the bugs you might have encountered on earlier versions, and made some general improvements to the app.

description: Use this simple app to track daily net carbohydrate consumption. Enter as little or as much information as you want. Enter the net carbs yourself, or enter all the nutrition details and let the app do the math for you. Please note that this does *not* tell you nutrition information! You have to know what you eat and use this to help keep track. Details are kept for each entry. Long-press to review or edit them any time. You can also export your history in a file suitable for Excel or any other spreadsheet software. A chart provides visual feedback of your day-to-day consumption of the nutrition info you care about: choose between total carbs, net carbs, calories, fiber, or sugar alcohols. A customizable widget lets you keep your counts at your fingertips. Perfect for Atkins, Paleo, South Beach, or for anyone counting carbs, calories, etc. This carb counter app utilizes the GraphView library which is released under the GNU Lesser General Public License.
release_text: Updated for Android changes.

description: Are your photos and movies asleep only in the Camera folder? Folder-Gallery - the master of Organizing photos and movies will solve your trouble . Another Gallery-App can classify your photos by location or time, but only with this it's hard to find your old photo and movie. So if you have organized your photos and movies by topic, it is easy. But with other App it is difficult to create a new folder and move/copy the photos and movies. Especially, to navigate a faw screen, is too confusing. In our Folder-Gallery App you show all your photos and folders on one screen and can process immediately and easy in the one screen. This will introduce you to move/copy your photos easy. This App features Organizing your photos and movies. Key Features 1, Create your folders - so you can categorize your photos in the folders 2.Move and Copy your photo and movie easily to another folder Your folders are listed in the top screen always. You can move / copy your photos and movies with Tapping the folder. it is very easy 3. Photo Explorer - In the photo Explorer, you can navigate folders up and down. you can organize your photo in your folder and sub-folder. 4. total and monthly views - You can show your photos full or monthly. 5.Grouping - Your photos and moview are classified based on the picture-date and the count. You can move and copy by the group 6. Folder excluded - You can exclude your unnecessary folder or secrit photos. it is hided 7.support to move and copy In other gallery-app - In your gallery-app, your move and copy your photos with Share fuction. 8.Register lock-app - Register your lock-app and you can use it easily. 9.etc - slideshow, share, send, rotate, crop, etc. tags : gallery, album, pic, picture, photo, photo album, photo gallery, Facebook, Twitter, photo wonder, image, instagram, Pinterest, Vingle

description: ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ The best, most relaxing and addictive game of solving equations and maths. Do you like maths? Do you want to enjoy while relaxing and refresh your mind? Download Aequalis now and get your brain training! Aequalis is an extremely fun game of equations, with 80 randomly generated levels and a beautiful artwork. Highlights ★ Visually stunning HD graphics. ★ Innumerable hours of gameplay through 80 different and randomly generated levels. You will need your logic to solve. ★ Four different challenges: normal, lightning round, resistance and “you can’t fail”. ★ Additions, subtractions, multiplications and divisions, with refreshing mixes of them. ★ Inspirational and relaxing music for your concentration ★ Challenging: Encourages to repeat and improve your score. Become a genius! ★ Highly playable and addictive Become smarter everyday, with just the pleasure of doing maths. Just breathe and enjoy the moment while refresh your mind. description: Get the most out of your Samsung, Medion Lifetab or Sony Tablet built in IR blaster with this powerful activity based universal remote control app. Huge database of over 300,000 devices almost guarantees it will support your home system. Will even control the XBox One. Works on ALL Samsung devices with built in IR. S4, S5 (all versions), Tab 2, 3 and 4, all Note tablets and Note 3 phone. Also HTC One phone and now the LG G3 Superphone. Sony tablets and Xperia ZL use Sony's built in database. Uses infrared and/or IP control. Control of a PC over WiFi requires our server app from www.touchsquid.com/MediaPC. The device is under the Media Manager category, brand Touchsquid. ACTIVITY BASED means one button to switch on all devices and set inputs for a particular activity. Typical activities are WATCH TV, PLAY DVD, and MEDIA MANAGER. Create a Room profile with all your devices. Then create activities such as Watch TV, Play DVD. Save the profile. Finally add favorite channels to an activity. Controls TVs, Set Top Boxes, DVD and Bluray players, CD and VCR, Receivers and amplifies, Soundbars, Game boxes and Media managers. Uses infrared and/or IP control. A growing list of devices can be controlled over wifi. 30 Day Money Back Guarantee! Take your time to try it out and get set up properly. This version is limited to 6 devices per room profile, but there is no limit to the number of profiles. You can customize buttons and layouts. No other universal remote control app is as versatile, except our own PRO version. Missing device? Contact support@ touchsquid.com and we will try to get the IR codes and add them. Setup is fast and easy, and does not require internet access. With this app and an infrared (IR) equipped tablet, you can take on the higher end remotes like Crestron and Control 4. Need even more power? Macros? Check out the PRO version. Search TouchSquid PRO. Hardware volume button on your tablet sends IR commands for volume up and down, can be held down. Themes are available to change the look of the app. Users can make their own, or choose from a growing library. Touchsquid is the smart way to use the built in infrared(IR) blaster on your phone or tablet. Works with all current Samsung Galaxy and Note tablets, S4 and S5 phones, and all Note 3 and Note 4 phones. Also supports the Medion Lifetab with built in IR.

description: Explorez Clash de Châteaux avec des Clasheurs provenant des 4 coins du monde ! Des NOUVELLES fonctions du jeu à découvrir ! Un des jeux de stratégie les mieux notés à travers le monde ! Une note de plus de 4,7 Étoiles ! Bâtissez et bataillez en frayant un chemin vers la victoire sur Clash de Châteaux! Avec plus de 100 millions de Clasheurs à travers le monde, ça va chauffer sur un des jeux les plus addictifs jamais vu ! Un mix fantastique de combat stratégique et excitant, Clash de Châteaux est un jeu à proportion épique ! Recrutez des légions de Héros puissants et menez une armée de créatures mythiques. Combattez pour atteindre le sommet et pour devenir le plus grand seigneur de guerre. Votre empire est aussi puissant que votre créativité ! Maintenant disponible en Français, Allemand, Espagnol, Russe, Chinois, Japonais, Coréen, Thaïlandais, Indonésien et plus. Fonctions du jeu : ✔ Évolution de Héros – Entrez en bataille avec des Héros relookés et plus surpuissants que jamais! ✔ L’Attaque des Monstres! Défiez le Boss avec vos amis! ✔ Défendez vos bases par équipe dans les combats co-op ! ✔ Bâtissez et améliorez votre forteresse impénétrable! ✔ Créez l’armée ultime composée d’une douzaine de troupes ! ✔ Batailles rapides, dynamiques et réalistes! ✔ Mettez vos Héros à l’épreuve contre d’autres joueurs dans l’Arène ! ✔ Créez votre propre Guilde et menez-la à la victoire dans la Guerre des Guildes! ✔ Rejoinez d’autres joueurs et conquérez les Donjons par Équipes ! ✔ Lancez des Sortilèges puissants en un simple glissement de doigt ! ✔ Jeu fantastique de stratégie Free-to-play. Note : Ce jeu nécessite une connexion internet. Visitez notre page Facebook sur : https://www.facebook.com/CastleClashFr Explore Clash Castles with Clasheurs from the 4 corners of the world! NEWS game functions to explore! One of the highest rated strategy games worldwide! A score of more than 4.7 Stars! Build and bataillez in pushing his way to victory on Clash of Castles! With over 100 million Clasheurs worldwide, it will heat up on one of the most addictive games ever seen! A fantastic mix of strategic and exciting fight, Castles Clash is a game to epic proportions! Recruit powerful heroes legions and lead an army of mythical creatures. Fight to reach the top and become the greatest warlord. Your empire is as powerful as your creativity! Now available in French, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Indonesian and more. Game Features: ✔ Heroes Evolution - Enter battle with Heroes redesigned and more overpowering than ever! ✔ Attack of the Monsters! Defeat the boss with your friends! ✔ Defend your bases team in co-op battles! ✔ Build and upgrade your impenetrable fortress! ✔ Create the ultimate army composed of a dozen troops! ✔ Quick Battles, dynamic and realistic! ✔ Put your hero to the test against other players in the Arena! ✔ Create your own guild and lead it to victory in the Guild Wars! ✔ Rejoinez other players and conquer the dungeons Teams! ✔ Launch powerful Spells a simple flick of your finger! ✔ fantasy strategy game Free-to-play. Note: This game requires an internet connection. Visit our Facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/CastleClashFr
release_text: 1. Ajout d'une nouvelle Héroïne: Valentina 2. Certains packs d’objets pourront désormais être ouverts en gros. 3. Vous pourrez désormais inviter vos amis aux Donjons en équipe et Attaque des Monstres en équipe et discuter avec vos coéquipiers en utilisant le Tchat d'équipe. 4. Ajout de nouveaux Exploits. 5. Ajout d'un bouton dans les Camps militaires qui vous permettra de changer de Camp. Pour plus d’aides, veuillez nous envoyer un mail à Help.castle.fr@igg.com en nous laissant votre IGG ID.

description: ATTENTION: expanded FREE and FULLY FEATURED version with ads! The most popular board game of the world is now available on Android! This is the one and only original by Schmidt Spiele: Play this original classic board game - suitable for young and old - on your own or with friends and try to get your figures to strike home. By shaking your phone, you can shake the dice which lends a certain dynamism to the game. The atmosphere of a genuine board game is guaranteed! Features: - Ad financed and fully featured - The original board game by Schmidt Spiele - Original board and token design - Customised playing rules - Multiplayer fun for 1-4 players - Clever artificial intelligence in play against the computer © 2011-2014 b-interaktive GmbH. All rights reserved. Licence by Schmidt Spiele GmbH in cooperation with KIDDINX Media GmbH, Lahnstr. 21 D - 12055 Berlin, Developed and Published by b-interaktive GmbH, Lohbachstr. 12, 58239 Schwerte Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/binteraktive

description: "Works great, sounds even better!" - Alex Miller "Hit of the wedding party. We laughed so hard!" - Scinlet "Love it. Great for jokes." - Derek Smith Fix ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The Whip Sound App - App from The Big Bang Theory Series! Has your friend just been told off by someone? Did your friend cave into doing something? Want to rub it in their face? Of course you do, and now you can - with The Whip Sound App for your Android device. With this application, your Android device will become the most hilarious, inappropriate and embarrassing sound after someone gets horrendously shouted at, told to do something or caves into something! It’s from your favourite TV show and now it’s in your pocket - the app projects a ‘whip’ sound whenever you shake or tap the device - the best part is: it boots within a second, making it the fastest way to ‘crack’ a joke! Your friends will hate how you completely humiliate them, just with a simple sound! They may hate you for it but they will simply love your humor. You don’t have to be a master of comedy to handle the whip - but timing can really help! So, you’ve watch The Big Bang Theory, you saw the whip and you wanted one? Then, The Whip Sound App is the perfect app for you! Download The Whip Sound App today and begin your day with a crack! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Shake or Tap to crack the whip! - Useful in hundreds of scenarios! - Can be used in serious or funny matters! - Like ‘The Big Bang Theory’ whip app!

description: This is a donation package for GravityBox Xposed module. Support the project and get a bonus in form of premium features such as: - Backup/Restore of the settings - Ultimate notification control Compatible with: GravityBox 3.1.4 or later IMPORTANT: this app is not a module itself. It is only a donation package. It won't show in launcher app drawer as it is not a standalone application. GravityBox Xposed Module manages launching it itself whenever unlock is needed. Visit official forum at XDA to find out more about GravityBox project More info, including installation instructions and links to xposed module itself are available in the following forums: JellyBean thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2316070 KitKat thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2554049 Lollipop thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=3037566 Marshmallow thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=3251148 I strongly encourage you to visit official forum, mainly to find out whether your device is compatible and fully supported by GravityBox before deciding to purchase this donation package; or before giving a negative rating. Remember, dealing with refund requests takes a lot of my precious time. Thanks for understanding.
release_text: - Prepared support for unlocking GravityBox for Marshmallow

description: " If you would like to share a fun design app with your child, be sure to check out Coco Paint My Dress!" By The iPhone Mom. How would you like to paint your own unique dresses? Paint all kinds of dresses, tops, skirts, pants, socks, shoes, and other accessories for four cute characters - Coco, Sophia, Peter and their feline friend, Kitty. Make your creations for them and they will tell you how much they like it with their fun voices. Add other decorations to your creations once you've finishing painting or coloring for that special touch. All dressed up? Time to take a snapshot! What’s more, you can even put on your own favorite clothes and take a picture together with them. Cool! Share photos with family and friends via email or Facebook. One last thing: remember to send the photo into our weekly contest, “My Dress Show”. Let’s see who will win the chance to be in the big show for tens of thousands of kids around the world. Wow! ^.^ We keep updating the APP to add more fun stuff for kids. Features: √ 4 fun characters to choose from √ 140+ items for dressing up √ Create your own dress designs by painting (older kids) or coloring (younger kids) √ Fun voices tell you how characters feel about dresses or accessories √ Take a snapshot of your creations. You can even put on your favorite clothes and take a snapshot with the characters! √ Send & share your designs with family and friends by email or Facebook √ Send creations to us for the weekly contest, “My Dress Show” √ Keep updating The four characters: Coco, the cute brown-haired girl, enjoys the sunshine on the beach. Sophia, the princess with golden hair, lives in the castle. Peter, the sports-loving boy, hangs out at the playground. Kitty, the fat cat in the garden, is the best friend of all the kids. Contacts: Like us on Facebook to get the latest apps and news: https://www.facebook.com/cocoplay Send us your ideas or questions: http://www.tabtale.com/contact/ Thanks for playing and please leave a review to keep free update coming! Your support is greatly appreciated! PRIVACY: * This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device. * By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/ . This App may include third parties services, such as ad networks and analytics, and may contain social media links that allow users communicate with others. Collection and use of data are subject to TabTale's Privacy Policy.

description: Trenìt! is the most popular app to search trains schedules and prices in Italy, available for both Android and iOS. Its first version was released in September 2009 with the name “Italian Trains Timetable”, and it became “Trenìt!” in May 2014. Main features: - search Trenitalia, Italo, Trenord and many other trains - detailed infos about trains status - complete view of all types of available tickets - possible to sort results by time, price and duration of the trip - direct links to purchase tickets directly from the train companies - list of all stops, with arrival and departure times - map of the journey with all stops - optimized for tablets (with dual-pane in landscape) - possible to share the details of a trip (via email, Facebook, Whatsapp, etc.) - app available in multiple languages
release_text: null

description: Mega Photo is the #1 app for transforming your photos and videos into fun and inspiring masterpieces with 100+ of FREE effects! Twist, morph, pinch, and warp your photos into outrageous designs! You can even spin your images in 3-D. There are over 100 free effects to choose from and you see them all in real-time. You can take videos with the effects too! You can pause the recording to switch effects in the middle of your video. Make a music video by selecting a soundtrack from your music library! Effects include: tunnel, mosaic, puzzle, hue shift, motion blur, tile, emboss, spinning cube, x-ray, collage, night vision, halftone, light tunnel, and many more. There's also 40 vintage camera effects for a retro feel. Mega Photo will transform your photos and videos with amazing effects you won't find in other photography apps. It's the most fun you can have with your photos! ** TRANSFORM YOUR PHOTOS IN AMAZING WAYS ** Mega Photo makes your photos and videos as unique as you are. Over 100 free effects are shown to you in real-time. You can play a tile puzzle with a live camera feed, go through a wormhole tunnel, view a spinning globe, and much more! The app can switch from the front to rear facing camera with the touch of a button. You can use the live camera or a still image - just choose a favorite picture from your library or take a new picture. Many of the photo effects are interactive so you can personalize it even before taking your picture or video. Tap and drag, zoom with two fingers, rotate, and more to make it your own. ** SHARE THE FUN WITH FRIENDS ** Photos are more fun with your friends, and Mega Photo makes it easy. Share your zany and funny photos (like you as the Mona Lisa!) easily. Just tap to email your photo or post to Facebook or Twitter. Are your friends nearby? Snap a photo with all of you using the helpful timer. Set the timer for up to 30 seconds so all your buddies can get in the picture. Don't forget to choose your favorite photo transformation to amaze your friends. ** APP FEATURES ** • Transform Your Photos - Distort, pinch, and change colors of your photos and videos • 100+ Free Effects - Apply eye-popping effects to your images with just a tap of your finger • Interactive Adjustable Filters - View and change your photo effects in real-time • Share with Friends - Easily post your photos to Facebook or Twitter, and email to friends and family. • Use Existing Photos - Snap a new photo or use your existing pics on your camera roll. • Play Games - Take your photos and play classic arcade games with your photos. • Take Video - Mega Photo can be used for video too with effects that would make Michael Bay jealous. • Add Music to Videos - Add music to your videos and become the next Justin Bieber with Mega Photo... or not.
release_text: more effects have been made free (unless you liked us on facebook already) bug fixes

description: The first ever game of its kind where you play cricket in Jungle (Forest) with wild animals. Its a real fun. Its a Jungle Cricket Premier League (JPL) ★★★Why game is super fun?★★★ ★ Different wild animals are players ★ Select any of your favorite Jungle animal from - Elephant (Mammoth) - Clever Fox - Chubby Fatty Rabbit - Naughty Frog - Forest Ant ★ King Tiger is Umpire & Lion is Referee ★ Some very angry but cute birds are scorer ★ Chimpanzee leopard and many wild animals are audience ★ Complete jungle theme with cool animation and sound effects ★★★Attraction★★★ * Incredible use of physics. * Addiction of keep sync with ball to hit more runs * Smooth and Fast game Play with nice sound effects * Unlimited game play with auto change levels ------------------- How To Play ------------------- ★ Select any of your player ★ Hit the ball with timing and get runs ★ You can select players from Elephant Fox Rabbit etc. ★ Tap anywhere on the screen to hit the ball Download and experience fast and T20 fun of Real Jungle cricket.

description: Get early access to cool new security and productivity tools in beta from McAfee. McAfee® Mobile Innovations provides you with an opportunity to try out groundbreaking new features and to give us feedback on how to improve them…or ditch them altogether. The list of features will grow and evolve over time based on your feedback. *** UPDATE *** ★ New Product "Personal Safety" ( McAfee Personal Safety makes it easy for you and the people in your life to stay safe in your daily activities –knowing your family’s location when it matters the most, and reaching your trusted connections at any time.) ★ Bug fixes and reduced battery consumption. ★ Newly redesigned for easier navigation and grouping of features for you to test ★ Easily access frequently used features ★ Share the app with your friends ******************* Get early access to cool new security and productivity tools in beta from McAfee. McAfee® Mobile Innovations provides you with an opportunity to try out groundbreaking new features and to give us feedback on how to improve them…or ditch them altogether. The list of features will grow and evolve over time based on your feedback. ======= FEATURES ► McAfee Contact Monitor - Keep an eye on your loved ones without bothering them. ► System Utilities - Kill running applications, free up additional Storage and clear your private data. ► Notification Blocker - Track and block notifications from apps that annoy you. ► Safe QR Reader - Ensure the QR codes are safe for browsing ► Data Vault - Protect your private photos, videos and documents from prying eyes, locally on your device. Backup your data vault to Dropbox to ensure you have access to your most private moments in case you’ve lost your device. ► Hidden Device Admin Detector - Detect and remove applications that are hidden from the list of device administration applications. ======= TELL US WHAT YOU THINK If you want to report a problem or you have any question regarding McAfee Mobile Innovations please check our forums at https://community.mcafee.com/groups/mmi and search for answers or post a new topic

description: The best visual & vocal idol group, EXO's dodol theme is launched! Finally!! XD Embrace EXO members in your phone ♥ * Apply the theme to transform your background screen, icon and launcher widget! :D * How to apply a theme - Install Dodol Launcher (if you haven't yet). - Press the home button and set the Dodol Launcher as the default home launcher by selecting [Use as default value for this task] or [Always]. - Open the launcher menu by swiping the home screen upwards, select the [Theme] menu, then select and apply the theme of your choice. ** Precaution - Is available only in Android ver. 4.0.2 and above (ICS, Jellybean) - Some functions cannot be applied in certain devices. * Customer Support http://m.help.naver.com/serviceMain.nhn?falias=mo_launcher_app&type=faq http://dodolhome ,blog.me * Why Dodol Launcher is so special - Cute, simple, vibrant, sophisticated, cuddly and warm themes are continuously updated - The default widget offers convenient functions, including quick switch and memory cleaner - Apps/widget can be used easily with the dock and alert shortcut list - Offers functions that can be used to decorate fonts/ringtones/keyboards - Offers detailed functions for screen rotation/individual icons/folders etc... - Supports functions in a convenient and stable manner by copying the home screen and creating backups of settings

description: Build the ultimate shopper's paradise, become a retail magnate and outsmart your competition before the last customer leaves town. "It's fun, compulsive, and easy to fit around your no doubt hectic life." - PocketGamer Build you stores, hire employees, order inventory and get rich! Serve your customers well and make sure they leave your town with no more money to spend! With a variety of maps and goals, Shopper's Paradise will give you hours of fun! Looking for some game to play on your lunch break? Shopper's Paradise HD is the one, but be careful not to get caught playing it after your lunch break is over! Be warned: Shopper's Paradise is really ADDICTIVE! Game tasks: * build, buy and sell stores, movie theaters, hotels, restaurants and warehouses * hire employees and manage inventory * build houses in your town to bring in more workers * pick best locations * maintain your properties * hire police officers to keep your town safe * catch thieves...if you can! All this and more in our first addictive map pack that will keep you glued to the screen for hours. Build your own shopping paradise and become a millionaire! "I had been looking for good simulation games on the market and had found only a few. I am pleased to say that I found one that I will be holding on to. Shopper's Paradise HD lives up to everything I was expecting from it and even a little more." -androidgamereviews.weebly.com "Shopper's Paradise HD is way more complete and enjoyable than the first one, as it includes more options and the design and graphics are better and visually more engaging." -AndroidZoom "... highly addictive and will keep you happily entertained for a very long time. It is highly recommended." - helium.com "Shopper's Paradise HD - Be A Tycoon Is Never A Dream From Now On!" - AppEggs.com Shopper's Paradise HD is brought to you by Second Gear Games, creator of Bubble Defense, Archipelago, Word Collapse and other popular games. Looking for tips, check on our pages: Google+ page: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/113483661233228184250/113483661233228184250/posts Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/SecondGearGames/129766460462879 Privacy disclaimer: The game requires Internet permission to send anonymous debug information when the game gets "force-closed". This information helps us improve the quality of the game. The app does not collect or transmit any personally identifiable information.

description: Super sexy and... uh, liney home screen clock with the date and today's weather. If you like this skin and would like to use hotspots or change the colour, try the paid version: http://goo.gl/mLhWW Please carefully read through all of the notes and instructions if this is your first UCCW Skin. After it is installed you won't find this skin/widget listed in your app drawer, it will only be visible when adding a new widget to your home screens. Please email me if you have any questions, suggestions, or issues! BEFORE USE =========== You will need to install the latest version of Ultimate Custom Clock Widget (UCCW) before you are able to use this skin. It is free, and you can download it from the Play Store here: http://goo.gl/q3Peh Thanks to VasuDev for UCCW! HOW TO USE =========== Add the widget to your home screen. 1) Add a new widget in the usual way (ie. press and hold on a blank part of your home screen). 2) Select UCCW and the size you would like, this depends on how many rows/columns you have your launcher set to. I use and recommend Apex Launcher. 3) From the list of widgets, select "Square Home" 4) Resize the widget if necessary and touch the pointing finger.

description: Take pictures with interval time in Wifi Mode for your Sony camera This application will NOT create a video from your pictures. Pictures are stored in your CAMERA SD CARD. How to use ----------------- * Start Timelapse app * Put your camera in "Ctrl with Smartphone" mode or pair it by NFC /!\ Some cameras don't have Remote Control application installed by default, you need to download it from Sony's store FAQ ------- http://thibaud-perso.com/timelapse-faq Features ------------- * Initial delay * Photo preview * Take pictures when screen is off Supported Devices -------------------------- * Sony A5100 * Sony A6000 * Sony Alpha-7 * Sony DSC-HX50V * Sony DSC-HX400V * Sony DSC-WX80 * Sony NEX-5R * Sony NEX-6 * Sony QX-10 / QX-100 * Sony QX 30 * Sony RX10 * Sony RX100-mk2 / RX100-mk3 Ask me for more camera support (need wifi connection) GitHub project: https://github.com/ThibaudM/timelapse-sony Donate? http://bit.ly/timelapse-sony-donate

description: Airplane Flight Simulator 3D is an awesome 3D Air Plane Sim flying game. Start off with learning how to fly a plane, you simply take off from airport island and flying the plane to another Airport Runway. You must then park the airplane on the runway. In this aircraft flying simulation game, complete the levels within 50% of the given time and collect all the rings to earn all 3 badges; so racing through the levels can get you all of the badges. As you develop your skills and progress through the game, you have the opportunity to unlock bigger and faster planes. Be very careful, there's a lot of passengers relying on your pilot skills.

app_name: RPG 剣とエルフとドワーフの王国 ゴールド増量
description: ★ゴールド増量★750ゴールドが最初から付与されています。 ヒーローと魔物の戦いを描くファンタジック・タワーディフェンス！ 平和なヒルランドを突如襲った謎のオークの軍勢……その恐るべき目的とは！？ ナイト、エルフ、ドワーフの3人の勇者たちの戦いが今始まる。 危機に陥った王国を救い、平和を取り戻せるか！？王国の存亡をかけた壮大な物語を体感しよう！ 【特長】 1) 戦場を駆け巡れ！ 操作は簡単。画面をタップすることでキャラクターはいつでも移動可能だ。 縦横無尽に戦場を駆け巡り、戦況に応じて臨機応変に陣形を整えよう。 2) 3人の個性を活かして戦え！ 3人には得手不得手がある。そして敵の種類も様々だ。妖精やゴブリン、オークなど攻撃パターンが異なる。それぞれの特性を活かした戦術が勝利のカギだ。時には、攻撃力をアップしたり、回復を早めたり、便利な強化アイテムも使うことができるぞ。 3) 成長する勇者たち 3人が持つ強力なアビリティは12種類。レベルアップするとポイントを割り振ることができる。好みのアビリティを強化しよう。 4) 多彩なステージと壮大な物語 戦いの場となるステージは森や沼地、雪山とバリエーション豊か。 勇者たちと共に、ファンタジックで壮大な世界を冒険しよう。 ※本アプリにはバナー広告やインタースティシャル広告は表示されません。 ■動作確認端末 ※動作確認端末以外の端末では正しく動作しない場合がございますので、ご了承ください。 以下の端末で動作確認を行っております。 OS：Android 2.3 NTT docomo GALAXY Note SC-05D au MOTOROLAPHOTON ISW11M、OptimusXIS11LG、DIGNOISW11K、MOTOROLARAZR IS12M OS：Android 4.0 NTT docomo SH-01D、SH-09D、GALAXY Note SC-05D、GALAXY S III SC-06D、SC-02C、SC-03D、SC-01E、SC-01D au OptimusXIS11LG、GALAXYSIIWiMAXISW11SC、Xperia acroHDIS12S、MOTOROLARAZR IS12M、ISW13HT、URBANO PROGRESSO、AQUOS PHONE CL IS17SH、Optimus G LGL21、DIGNO S KYL21、G'zOne TYPE-L CAL21、LifeTouch L OS：Android 4.1 NTT Docomo F-02E、SH-02E、SH-09D、SO-01E、SO-02E、GALAXY Note II SC-02E、SC-05D、GALAXY S III SC-06D、GALAXY S III α SC-03E au Xperia(TM) VL SOL21、VEGA PTL21、GALAXY SIII Progre SCL21、AQUOS PHONE SERIE SHL21、HTC J butterfly HTL21、INFOBAR A02 HTX21、Xperia(TM) UL SOL22、HTC J One HTL22、AQUOS PAD SHT21 Willcom WX04K、WX04SH ASUS（TF201） OS：Android 4.2 NTT Docomo SH-06E、SO-04E、GALAXY S4 SC-04E au URBANO L01、FJL22、SHL22、SHL23、KYL22、LGL22、HTL22、SOL22、SOL23、 OS：Android 4.3 NTT Docomo SC-01F au SCL22 (C)2013 www.handy-games.com GmbH / Worker Bee Inc. ※本アプリ『RPG 剣とエルフとドワーフの王国 ゴールド増量』はデベロッパー：HandyGames の『Guns'n'Glory Heroes Premium』の日本向けバージョンとなります。日本向けに一部仕様を変更しております。 ※本アプリ『RPG 剣とエルフとドワーフの王国 ゴールド増量』はデベロッパー：HandyGames からライセンスを許諾され、配信をしております。 ※This application “RPG 剣とエルフとドワーフの王国 ゴールド増量” is a special version for the Japanese market of the “Guns'n'Glory Heroes Premium” originally developed by “HandyGames”. description: Telefonun arka planında açık kalan ve hafızayı gereksiz kullanan uygulamaları kapatarak şarjınızın daha uzun süre gitmesini ve telefonunuzun yavaşlamasını engeller. Neden 'Otomatik Sonlandırıcı''ya İhtiyaç Duyarım? - Bazı oyunlar ve uygulamalar siz kapatsanız bile arka planda açık kalır. Bu da telefonunuzun hafızasında belli bir yer tutar ve telefonunuzun yavaşlamasına neden olur. Aynı zamanda açık kalan uygulamalar devamlı telefonunuzun şarjını tüketir. "Auto task killer" sizin belirlediğiniz uygulamaların arka planda açık kalmasını engeller. Her bir görev sonlandırımında size hafızada açılan alanı bildirir. Ayrıca "Auto Task Killer" telefonunuzda çok az yer kaplar ve çok az yorar. Auto Task Killer Özellikleri Nelerdir? - Telefonunuzdaki tüm uygulamaları listeleme ve sıralama özelliği, - Telefon hafızasındaki uygulamaların kapladığı alanı ve ne kadar boş alan kaldığını gösterme özelliği, - Ayarlar menüsünden "Auto Task Killer" etkinleştirme seçeneği, - Telefon açıldığında otomatik "Auto Task Killer" uygulamasını başlatma seçeneği, - Seçilen uygulamalar ya da tüm uygulamaları sonlandırma seçeneği, - Görevleri ya da tüm işlemleri sonlandırma seçeneği, - Hafızanın kullanım oranına göre sonlandırma seçeneği. Örn : %80 i seçerseniz telefon hafızasının %80 i aşıldığında otomatik olarak seçilen kriterlere göre arka planda açık olan görevler sonladırılır. - 5, 10, 30 ya da 60 sn aralıklarla uygulama sonlandırma seçeneği, - Sonlandırma sonucunda hafızada boşaltılan alanı bildirme seçeneği, Uygulamayı iyileştirebilmemiz için gördüğünüz eksikleri, fikirlerinizi bize mail atınız.
release_text: Telefon açıldığında uygulamanın açılması başarısız olduğundan, harici belleğe taşıma özellği kapatıldı.

description: Lustre is a refreshing take on button style icon design. Each icon is hand-crafted to give your Android an elegant touch. Enclosed by a metal frame, you'll see familiar designs with a vibrant and crisp edge to them. If you have found your device lacking a certain spark, these icons will breathe new life to your homescreen visuals. Over 2200 icons made in beautiful QHD resolution and a complete set of wallpapers, served directly from the cloud. We've got search available, to help you find exactly the icon you need. Not sure if we support your launcher? Have any other questions? Feel free to check out the help section, included in the icon pack dashboard. If you can't find the answer you are looking for, contact us! /// CONNECT WITH US G+ Community: http://kvdv.co/community Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/kovdev Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/kovdev Google+: http://plus.google.com/+kovdev Google Now Launcher is not compatible as it does not support icon packs. We recommend Nova. Tags: #Nova.theme
release_text: [3.0.7] • 25+ new icons • Appfilter improved

description: Qibla locator , Qiblah finder application. You can use this application via GPS sensor anywhere in the World. Makkah and Kaaba finder. This application uses both google maps method and classic compass method. So it is too easy to solve the Qibla angle with this app. In our algortihm we measure also world deviaton. We get latest deviation calculation from NOAA National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) of US. internet is required calculation. Outside of Europe Middle East Region (EMEA) internet is compulsory for correct compass calculation due to the deviation of our planet. Muslim prayers may use this compass algortihm with their android phones and tablets. We are working hard to support all location. Using gps sensors it is possible to calculate the correct qibla angle especially for Europe and Middle East, but outside of this places are recommended to use google maps algorith or may use predefined city records.
release_text: Performance improvements , bug fixes

release_text: 【version1.8】 ・解像度WQHDに対応しました。 ・GooglePlayから開けない問題に対応しました。 ・「こども海の生物図鑑」のダウンロードができるようになりました。 【version1.7】 ・「こども特急図鑑2」のダウンロードができるようになりました。 【version1.6】 ・「こども特急図鑑」のダウンロードができるようになりました。 【version1.5】 ・解像度1920*1080(FHD)に対応しました。 【version1.4】 ・「こども乗り物図鑑」のダウンロードができるようになりました。 【version1.3】 ・野菜の名前（テキスト）を追加しました。 【version1.2】 ・解像度1280*720(HD)、960*540(qHD)に対応しました。 ・音声再生時の不具合を修正しました。 ・「Animal Book」のダウンロードができるようになりました。 【version1.1】 ・野菜の名前（音声）を追加しました。

description: This is the 'SCREEN flashlight version'. For the camera flash version check https://market.android.com/details?id=com.ssdevapp.flashlight This Application packs in 4 different features. 1. It serves as a flashlight app, it sets the screen brightness to the max. 2. 'Flash text' Type a text and flash it, let your friend know what you want to tell without saying a word! :) Phone keeps on flashing the text till the user presses the back or the home button. 3. SOS feature: In emergency situations you may wanna use the SOS feature to alert others, just tap the button and the screen flashes the SOS signal. 4. Finally 'Morse code' Type any text and phone flashes the morse code. Just for fun! :) This is a freeware. Please do not leave bad comments as a lot of effort has been put up. Thanks! Hope you like it! If any more features are required, send an email at ssdevapp@gmail.com !
release_text: 7th November 2011: version 1 launched!!!

description: Omskriven på batliv.se, feber.se, pcforalla.idg.se och i tidningarna Vi Båtägare och Praktiskt Båtägande. Förarintyg är en heltäckande utbildningsapplikation för blivande fritidsskeppare som ska ta förarintyg och för mer erfarna båtägare och seglingsentusiaster som vill friska upp sina kunskaper inför båtsäsongen. Alla frågor, svar och förklaringar och all teori i appen bygger på den senaste kurslitteraturen och täcker in alla ämnen som tas upp i den. Förarintyg innehåller 400 teorifrågor som påminner om frågorna på det riktiga provet samt 60 sjökortsfrågor*. För att uppmuntra djupinlärning så har två tredjedelar av frågorna en tillhörande förklaringsruta som ger mer detaljerad information på ämnet eller förklarar varför rätt svar är rätt och varför fel svar är fel. INNEHÅLL • 400 teorifrågor och 60 sjökortsfrågor • Över 300 utförliga förklaringar till frågorna • Lättläst sammanfattning av teorin • Lista med navigations- och båttermer • Statistik för både teori- och sjökortsprovet • Detaljerad, överskådlig och pedagogisk rättning med förklaringar • Automatisk sparfunktion som ger dig möjlighet att återuppta påbörjade prov • Slumpad placering på alla svarsalternativ • Inbyggd funktion för att utmana vänner via mail • Kompakt universaldesign anpassad för de flesta skärmstorlekar • Intuitivt, vackert och högupplöst gränssnitt FEEDBACK Kontakta oss på kontakt@boboshi.se om du har synpunkter på innehållet eller idéer om hur vi kan förbättra applikationen. Vi uppskattar verkligen all feedback vi kan få! OM INTYGET Förarintyg för fritidsbåt (kallas även skärgårdsskepparexamen, förarbevis och båtkörkort) är en nautisk icke professionell examen i bland annat navigation och säkerhet till sjöss som regleras av Nämnden för båtlivsutbildning (NFB). Intyget ger ingen särskild behörighet men krävs oftast av den som ska hyra båt, intyget kan dessutom ge en lägre försäkringspremie. Förarintyg är även en förutsättning för att kunna ta kustskepparintyg. *För att besvara sjökortsfrågorna krävs övningssjökorten 616 och 6163. De finns att köpa online och i välsorterade båtbutiker. Featured on batliv.se, feber.se, pcforalla.idg.se and in the newspapers, we Boaters and Practical Båtägande. Driver's certificate is a comprehensive educational app for budding recreational boaters to take driver's certificate and for more experienced boaters and boating enthusiasts who want to brush up their skills before the boating season. Any questions, answers and explanations and all the theory in the app based on recent literature and covers all the topics covered in it. Driver's certificate contains 400 questions on theory reminiscent of the questions on the real exam and 60 charts questions *. To encourage deep learning, two thirds of the questions an accompanying explanation box that provides more detailed information on the substance or explain why the right answer is right and why wrong answers are wrong. CONTENT • 400 theoretical questions and 60 charts questions • Over 300 detailed explanations to questions • Easy to read summary of the theory • List of navigation and BOAT • Statistics of both theory and charts sample • Detailed, foreseeable and pedagogical correction with explanations • Automatic saving feature that allows you to resume started trial • Random placement on all possible answers • Built-in feature to challenge friends via email • Compact universal design to fit most screen sizes • Intuitive, nice and high resolution interface FEEDBACK Contact us at kontakt@boboshi.se if you have comments on the content or ideas on how we can improve the application. We really appreciate all the feedback we can get! If the certificate Driver's certificate for recreational boating (also called archipelago Skipper, licenses and boating license) is a nautical non professional degree in including navigation and safety at sea governed by the Board of boating education (NFB). The certificate gives no specific entry requirements but is usually required of the person who will rent a boat, the certificate may also provide a lower insurance premium. Drivers certificate is also a prerequisite for taking the coastal ship master. * In order to answer the questions the chart takes practice charts 616 and 6163rd They are available online and in the well-stocked Detailing.
release_text: Nytt i v1.0.3 - Fixade så att appen inte kraschar på bl.a. Samsung Galaxy S3. Nytt i v1.0.2 - Fixade problemet med att statistiken inte sparades när man stängde av appen.

description: Ornidroid is a free and open source application for bird watchers. It has a database of around 450 European common species. Ornidroid provides : a search engine on bird names in many European languages and also in Japanese and Chinese. A search on scientific names is also available. a multi criteria search : you can browse birds by feather colour, category, size, etc... for each species, there are multimedia resources (zoomable pictures, sound records), a short description (only in French) and the list of the names in different languages. You can download pictures and sounds while you use the application. If you want to use Ornidroid when you are offline, you can install the full packages of sounds and pictures on your device (around 200 Mb are needed). Please go to https://github.com/giletvin/ornidroid/wiki for more information. User's guide : https://github.com/giletvin/ornidroid/wiki/Help How-to install the full packages of sounds and pictures : https://github.com/giletvin/ornidroid/wiki/Installation-en Keywords : Nature, Birds, ornithology, birdwatching, oiseaux, ornithologie
release_text: Version 11.2.0 (02/01/2016) - database in catalan, basque and galician Version 11.1.0 (07/20/2015) enhancements on the zoomed images screen few fixes in the database enhancements in the multi criteria search * Version 11.0.0 (01/23/2015) - database in serbian and slovenian

description: A game of endurance and survival instincts. Dodge dangerous objects for as long as you can. Simply touch the screen to activate your jetpack as you fly through a dangerous cave. Avoid the obstacles and creatures that get in your way. Collect hearts to repair your suit and bananas for bonus points!

description: UFO is a simple but fast-paced and addictive game of ability for all ages. Just tilt your device or touch screen (depends on selected option) to control the UFO and collect the aliens to score points. You get more points closer to the center of the OVNI. UFO has several game modes, each with its initial difficulty. Ranking: There is a list of the best scores for each game mode. In Survive and Max Score modes scores can be uploaded from the first result. In modes Easy, Intermediate and Advanced you get total scoce to upload to Ranking when you complete all game levels. Total score is the sum of every level score. You can replay any level to get a better score and improve the total score. If you want to help translate UFO to your language, contact the author: cerezosoft@gmail.com
release_text: Fixed minor bugs

description: It's a fast and easy way to read news (berita) in Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) on Android. Indonesia News gives you easy access to read the most popular news sources from Indonesia on your Android device. Take this app with you and stay informed with access to the news. description: "Grocery list" is an elegant app to keep track of your shopping lists. Create multiple shopping lists, for example one for groceries, gifts, things you need to remember etc. It is also possible to buy synchronization, so that multiple devices can share shopping lists. Ideal for families who need flexibility, whether it is one or the other to shop. You can select which lists must be synchronized, and which should remain your own private list. - Built-in self-learning dictionary: Entered items are automatically stored in the dictionary for future fast entry through word prompter - The items can be grouped in colors, so that the list is grouped by where in the supermarket the items are. - Checkmark the goods of while you shop, so you always have an overview of what you are missing. Items that are ticked, goes to the bottom of the list. They can easily come back on the list, simply by clicking on them. - Send your shopping list by SMS or email. - Synchronize with other iPhones / iPads and sync also with devices from other platforms. - Change the language from within the settings. - Multiplatform install the app on iOS and other platforms.

description: Program do skutecznego porozumiewania się w języku hiszpańskim. Przeznaczony jest zarówno dla osób początkujących, jak i tych, którzy pragną wzbogacić zasób słownictwa. Szczególną uwagę zwrócono w nim na najważniejszą sprawność językową - umiejętność prowadzenia swobodnych rozmów w języku hiszpańskim. Zastosowana w programie innowacyjna metoda komunikacji pozwala szybko pozbyć się bariery w mówieniu i sprawnie wyrażać w codziennych sytuacjach. Program przeznaczony jest przede wszystkim dla osób zainteresowanych czynnym opanowaniem języka hiszpańskiego. Wszystkie słowa, zwroty i dialogi nagrane zostały przez profesjonalnych lektorów hiszpańskich. Logiczny podział na 127 tematów i kategorii wraz z szybkim systemem wyszukiwania pozwala błyskawicznie odnaleźć każde potrzebne słowo lub zwrot. Program doskonale sprawdza się również w roli elektronicznego, mówiącego tłumacza podczas wyjazdów za granicę. Dzięki niemu z łatwością porozumiesz się we wszystkich typowych sytuacjach - w sklepie, w banku, w hotelu, na lotnisku... Bez problemu kupisz bilet w kasie, złożysz zamówienie w restauracji, zapytasz o drogę lub też umówisz się na spotkanie. Program stanowi doskonałą propozycję dla osób przygotowujących się do egzaminów ustnych z języka hiszpańskiego oraz wyjeżdżających za granicę w celach turystycznych, do pracy lub na studia. W programie między innymi: - nagrania z udziałem rodowitych Hiszpanów - 127 grup tematycznych i kategorii - praktyczne rozmówki, konwersacje i dialogi - słownik hiszpańsko-polski, polsko-hiszpański - nauka prawidłowej wymowy - tworzenie własnych dialogów i scenek sytuacyjnych - innowacyjny system zapamiętywania wyrażeń - szybkie wyszukiwanie słów i zwrotów - uproszczony zapis wymowy - przykłady użycia słów w zdaniach - kurs konwersacyjny języka hiszpańskiego - zintegrowany odtwarzacz słów i zwrotów DIALOGI: Na granicy, Odprawa pasażerów, Podróż pociągiem, U lekarza, W recepcji hotelowej, W restauracji, Zwiedzanie, W mieście, Pierwsze rozmowy, W sklepie, Dojazd do centrum, Poza miastem, Wymiana walut, Na poczcie, Szukanie pracy, Pytanie o czas, Wypadek samochodowy, Informacja turystyczna, Wynajem samochodu. GRUPY TEMATCZNE: Zakwaterowanie, Pytanie o drogę, Gastronomia, Zdrowie, Zakupy, Czas wolny, Pierwsze spotkania, Podróż, Liczby/Czas, Miejsca publiczne, Praca/Nauka, Środowisko. Kategoria ogólna Bezpłatna wersja programu zawiera 800 słów i zwrotów, natomiast w pełnej wersji dostępnych jest 4000 słów, zwrotów i zdań. A program to communicate effectively in Spanish. It is suitable for both beginners and those who want to enrich vocabulary. Particular attention was paid to him in the most important language proficiency - the ability to conduct free conversations in Spanish. Used in the innovative method of communication allows you to quickly get rid of the barriers in speaking and efficiently expressed in everyday situations. The program is designed primarily for those interested in active mastery of the Spanish language. All words, phrases and dialogues were recorded by professional native speakers of Spanish. Logical division by 127 subjects and categories with a quick search system allows you to quickly find any word or phrase you need. Program also excels in the role of electronic, speaking interpreter during trips abroad. It allows easy communication among all typical situations - in the store, at the bank, at the hotel, at the airport ... No problem, buy a ticket at the counter, you order at a restaurant, ask for directions, or you go out for a meeting. The program is an excellent choice for those preparing for oral exams in Spanish and traveling abroad as a tourist, to work or to study. The program includes: - Recordings with native Spaniards - 127 focus groups and categories - Practical phrasebook, conversations and dialogues - Bab.la Spanish-Polish, Polish-Spanish - Learn the correct pronunciation - Create their own situational dialogues and scenes - An innovative system for memorizing phrases - Quick search words and phrases - Simplified record pronunciation - Examples of the use of words in sentences - Conversational Spanish course - Integrated player words and phrases Asking for: At the border, check passengers by train, At the doctor's, the hotel reception, the restaurant, walking in the city, the first conversation in the shop, Journey to the center, outside the city, Currency Exchange, the post office, job search, question of time Car accident, Tourist information, Rent a Car. GROUP TEMATCZNE: Accommodation, Question of the way, Gastronomy, Health, Shopping, Leisure, first meetings, Travel, Numbers / Time, Public Places, Work / Science, Environment. General Category Free version contains 800 words and phrases, while the full version available is 4000 words, phrases and sentences.

description: Sure, you can navigate, avoid traffic, and all that good stuff. What Scout lets you do, is focus on what really matters - the people at the end of the journey. Let them know when you're on the way, and that you've arrived safely, without fumbling around with an app or text message. Pick up the kids when they're done with the movie. Have your friend or spouse come and get you from the mall after you've got that special present safely hidden. We've got you covered. Because the experience at your destination, with the people you're sharing it with, is the whole point. We're @Scout on Twitter. Happy driving!
release_text: * We brought back the location labels. Sorry everyone, we messed up there, but it's fixed now! Also, we continue to focus on the people that matter: * Automatic Notifications -- A great way to let your family know that you're on the way home from work, or that you've arrived safely at your destination. Configure it once, and we'll do the rest for you. * Traffic Report -- Set up an automatic alert to let you know the best route and travel time. You won't even need to open the app!

description: Break Down Game is a fun block matching game! Click on blocks of 2 or more of the same type to collapse them, as quickly as you can, before they overflow the board. The more blocks you remove at one click, the higher the score you get. In Unlimited Mode, you can play for unlimited time until the board is fully filled by the blocks. More type of blocks will come as you progress. In 50 Taps Mode, you can tap only 50 times. Try to get the best score within these taps. In TImed Mode, you have 2 minutes. Try to collapse the blocks as quickly as you can. 1 second is added to the timer when you collapse 4 or more blocks. In Crash Mode, the whole board is filled when you start. Try to collapse all the blocks to get the best score. Features: - 4 Different Modes. - 6 Types of Blocks to choose from.

description: The Earthquake Network research project ( http://www.earthquakenetwork.it ) aims at developing a smartphone-based crowsourced early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population. The app Earthquake Network allows you to receive the real time notifications of the earthquakes detected by the network, to manually report an earthquake you felt and to chat with other people during an earthquake emergency. The app also shows information on the earthquakes detected by the national and international seismic networks . Smartphones (or tablets) are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each smartphone. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly notified. As the waves of the earthquake travel at a given speed (from 5 to 10 km/s), it is possible to notify the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. Note that the project is currently at the experimental stage. Detection of earthquakes is influenced by the number of active devices in the area hit by the earthquakes, by the their spatial distribution and by the sensitivity of the accelerometers. Nonetheless, the goal of the warning system is to detect strong earthquakes that has the potential to harm or damage people and things. Information on earthquakes detected by the national and international seismic networks are usually published with a delay ranging from few minutes to many hours, depending on the network. For more information please visit the web pages of the networks included in the application and listed below. USGS (U.S. Geological Survey) http://www.usgs.gov EMSC (European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre) http://www.emsc-csem.org GeoNet (Earthquake Commission and GNS Science) http://www.geonet.org.nz CSN (Centro Sismologico Nacional) http://www.sismologia.cl INGV (Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia) http://www.ingv.it IGN (Instituto Geográfico Nacional) http://www.ign.es CSI (China Seismic Information) http://www.csi.ac.cn JMA (Japanese Meteorological Agency) http://www.jma.go.jp Ineter (Instituto Nicaragüense de Estudios Territoriales) http://www.ineter.gob.ni SSN (Servicio Sismológico Nacional) http://www.ssn.unam.mx SGC (Servicio Geológico Colombiano) http://www2.sgc.gov.co RSN (Red Sismológica Nacional) http://www.rsn.ucr.ac.cr Funvisis (Fundación Venezolana de Investigaciones Sismológicas) http://www.funvisis.gob.ve INPRES (Instituto Nacional de Prevención Sísmica) http://www.inpres.gov.ar/

description: NO ADS! Traffic web cams for commuters in Auckland, NZ Ready to head home and you want to check the traffic? Live Traffic Auckland is the fastest way to get to the traffic web cams that matter to you. Instead of browsing to a web site and working your way through the menus and map graphics to find a web camera just open Live Traffic Auckland on your android and go straight to the camera you want with one click. Navigate through the other cameras along your route, in order, with a simple Next button. Should I stay or should I go? The traffic is slowing to a crawl. Is it going to clear quickly or is it time to bail and find a better route? Open Live Traffic Auckland, select the nearest camera with one click and then navigate through the web cams along your route to see how far the congestion continues. description: Tired of onscreen keyboards? Rather want to type your SMS messages on your desktop keyboard than on your phone? Then Remote Keyboard is the app for you! Remote Keyboard allows you to connect your desktop computer's keyboard via wlan (can be forwarded over USB via ADB) to your android device and control it comfortably through any telnet client. FEATURES: * Copy&Paste text from Droid to PC and vice versa. * Share text with the app to automatically send it to the client. * Emoji support through word substitution (requires a Jelly Bean device with the according fonts; Definition lists available on the website). * Build in ROT13 scrambler. * Put favorite apps on Speeddial (launch them with the function keys). * Password protection USAGE: After installing the Remote Keyboard on your device, you must enable it as an input method. The app will guide you through the process. On the PC side, you will need a telnet client to make the connection. Telnet comes pre installed on all major operation systems. Windows users (Vista and later), however, need to explicitly enable it via the control panel or (preferably) install a 3rd party telnet client like PuTTY. Remote Keyboard is free and open source software. For more information, sideloading options or to spend me a coffee, please visit my website.

description: THIS IS A TRIAL VERSION. THE FULL VERSION HAS 4 BOOKS AND 4 CAROLS WITH KARAOKE. About the full version: Christmas Story Books is a growing collection of Christmas stories for children of all ages. Just as a stocking filled with toys and goodies this app comes filled with Christmas stories. This app includes Christmas books of different kinds - classics, tales that are passed on from generation to generation and beautifully read with professional voice over. Each book comes rich with vibrant pictures, engaging narration and lively music. The app comes with all the cool features of the iStoryBooks platform such as: * "Read to me" which when enabled reads books to kids * "Movie mode" which when enabled automatically turns the pages * Option to save all media on SD card * User interface designed for little fingers and inquisitive minds The app is being launched with the following Christmas books: * A Christmas Carol: It is one of the most beloved winter stories. In this tale, a man named Scrooge is taken on a fantastic journey to the past, present, and future in order to realize the true meaning of Christmas. * The Elves and the Shoemaker: It is a fun Christmas story about a couple who became very wealthy because of the secret help of magical elves. But when they learn how poor the elves are, the couple sew up a little Christmas magic of their own. In the end, everyone learns the value of hard work, saving wisely, and being grateful. * The Nutcracker: This version of the Nutcracker tells the story of Clara, who yells when her little brother breaks her new toy. During very strange and frightening dream that night, she uses her courage to save her toy. When she wakes up, she uses that same courage to forgive her brother – realizing that losing a toy isn’t as bad as losing a friendship. * ‘Twas the Night Before Christmas: Waking up to find your stocking filled with toys and goodies is exciting. But even more exciting, as the person in this poem discovers, is catching a glimpse of the magical reindeer flying and St. Nick or Santa Claus himself – filling your very own stocking! As we add more books in the future, they will automatically appear in the app. The app is essentially a growing library for growing minds. For more information, visit facebook.com/iStoryBooks.
release_text: * Movie Mode * Save to SD * Large text for early readers * Smooth page transitions * Professional voice over and Music * Added catalog with 2 Bible stories
